verses.verse: And God <S%H430><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> words, <S%H1697><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> which <S%H834><s%> have brought <S%H3318><s%> you out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> out of the house <S%H1004><s%> of bondage. <S%H5650><s%>
You shall have no <S%H3808><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods <S%H430><s%> before <S%H5921><s%> <S%H6440><s%> me.

You shall not make <S%H6213><s%> to you any graven <S%H6459><s%> image, <S%H6754><s%> or any <S%H3605><s%> likeness <S%H8544><s%> of any thing that is in heaven <S%H8064><s%> above, <S%H4605><s%> or that is in the earth <S%H776><s%> beneath, <S%H8478><s%> or that is in the water <S%H4325><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> the earth. <S%H776><s%>

You shall not bow <S%H7812><s%> down <S%H7812><s%> yourself to them, nor <S%H3808><s%> serve <S%H5647><s%> them: for I the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> am a jealous <S%H7067><s%> God, <S%H410><s%> visiting <S%H6485><s%> the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of the fathers <S%H1><s%> on the children <S%H1121><s%> to the third <S%H8029><s%> and fourth <S%H7256><s%> generation of them that hate <S%H8130><s%> me;
And showing <S%H6213><s%> mercy <S%H2617><s%> to thousands <S%H505><s%> of them that love <S%H157><s%> me, and keep <S%H8104><s%> my commandments. <S%H4687><s%>

You shall not take <S%H5375><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> in vain; <S%H7723><s%> for the LORD <S%H3068><s%> will not hold him guiltless <S%H5352><s%> that takes <S%H5375><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> in vain. <S%H7723><s%>
Remember <S%H2142><s%> the sabbath <S%H7676><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> to keep <S%H6942><s%> it holy. <S%H6942><s%>
Six <S%H8337><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> shall you labor, <S%H5647><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> your work: <S%H4399><s%>

But the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> is the sabbath <S%H7676><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God: <S%H430><s%> in it you shall not do <S%H6213><s%> any <S%H3605><s%> work, <S%H4399><s%> you, nor your son, <S%H1121><s%> nor your daughter, <S%H1323><s%> your manservant, <S%H5650><s%> nor your maidservant, <S%H519><s%> nor your cattle, <S%H929><s%> nor your stranger <S%H1616><s%> that is within your gates: <S%H8179><s%>

For in six <S%H8337><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> heaven <S%H8064><s%> and earth, <S%H776><s%> the sea, <S%H3220><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> that in them is, and rested <S%H5117><s%> the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day: <S%H3117><s%> why <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> blessed <S%H1288><s%> the sabbath <S%H7676><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> and hallowed <S%H6942><s%> it.

Honor <S%H3513><s%> your father <S%H1><s%> and your mother: <S%H517><s%> that your days <S%H3117><s%> may be long <S%H748><s%> on the land <S%H127><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> gives <S%H5414><s%> you.
You shall not kill. <S%H7523><s%>
You shall not commit <S%H5003><s%> adultery. <S%H5003><s%>
You shall not steal. <S%H1589><s%>
You shall not bear <S%H6030><s%> false <S%H8267><s%> witness <S%H5707><s%> against your neighbor. <S%H7453><s%>

You shall not covet <S%H2530><s%> your neighbor's <S%H7453><s%> house, <S%H1004><s%> you shall not covet <S%H2530><s%> your neighbor's <S%H7453><s%> wife, <S%H802><s%> nor his manservant, <S%H5650><s%> nor his maidservant, <S%H519><s%> nor his ox, <S%H7794><s%> nor his ass, <S%H2543><s%> nor any <S%H3605><s%> thing that is your neighbor's. <S%H7453><s%>

And all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> the thunder, <S%H6963><s%> and the lightning, <S%H3940><s%> and the noise <S%H6963><s%> of the trumpet, <S%H7782><s%> and the mountain <S%H2022><s%> smoking: <S%H6226><s%> and when the people <S%H5971><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> it, they removed, <S%H5128><s%> and stood <S%H5975><s%> afar <S%H7350><s%> off.

And they said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> Speak <S%H1696><s%> you with us, and we will hear: <S%H8085><s%> but let not God <S%H430><s%> speak <S%H1696><s%> with us, lest <S%H6435><s%> we die. <S%H4191><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the people, <S%H5971><s%> Fear <S%H3372><s%> not: for God <S%H430><s%> is come <S%H935><s%> to prove <S%H5254><s%> you, and that his fear <S%H3374><s%> may be before <S%H5921><s%> your faces, <S%H6440><s%> that you sin <S%H2398><s%> not.

And the people <S%H5971><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> afar <S%H7350><s%> off, and Moses <S%H4872><s%> drew near <S%H5066><s%> to the thick darkness <S%H6205><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> God <S%H430><s%> was.

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> Thus <S%H3541><s%> you shall say <S%H559><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> You have seen <S%H7200><s%> that I have talked <S%H1696><s%> with you from heaven. <S%H8064><s%>
You shall not make <S%H6213><s%> with me gods <S%H430><s%> of silver, <S%H3701><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall you make <S%H6213><s%> to you gods <S%H430><s%> of gold. <S%H2091><s%>

An altar <S%H4196><s%> of earth <S%H127><s%> you shall make <S%H6213><s%> to me, and shall sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> thereon <S%H5921><s%> your burnt <S%H5930><s%> offerings, and your peace <S%H8002><s%> offerings, your sheep, <S%H6629><s%> and your oxen: <S%H1241><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> places <S%H4725><s%> where <S%H834><s%> I record <S%H2142><s%> my name <S%H8034><s%> I will come <S%H935><s%> to you, and I will bless <S%H1288><s%> you.

And if <S%H518><s%> you will make <S%H6213><s%> me an altar <S%H4196><s%> of stone, <S%H68><s%> you shall not build <S%H1129><s%> it of hewn <S%H1496><s%> stone: for if you lift <S%H5130><s%> up your tool <S%H2719><s%> on it, you have polluted <S%H2490><s%> it.
Neither <S%H3808><s%> shall you go <S%H5927><s%> up by steps <S%H4609><s%> to my altar, <S%H4196><s%> that your nakedness <S%H6172><s%> be not discovered <S%H1540><s%> thereon. <S%H5921><s%>
